constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 193 (Wednesday, November 3, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. ISSA:
H.R. 5843.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 18 of the Constitution.
[Page H6179]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to consider certain transactions related to precious metals for purposes of identifying jurisdictions of primary money laundering concern, and for other purposes.
